body.name: 3x Hello Beautiful Rearview Mirror Decal, Vanity Mirror Stickers, Rear View Mirror Vinyl Decal, Car Accessories Gifts, Car Decal For Women, Car Window Decal, Self Affirmations Decal
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 2 hrs 23 mins
features: 【 Materials】Use these beautiful self-affirmation stickers to boost your self-esteem, they are perfect for your car's rearview mirror or any other smooth surface. These stickers are made from high-quality vinyl, which is durable, waterproof, and easy to use, ensuring that they will last.

【Set of 3】The set includes three stickers, each with the inspiring message "hello beautiful". The messages are written in bold, easy-to-read fonts and will stand out on any surface, reminding you of your worth and encouraging self-love.

【Size】These stickers are designed to fit any car's rearview mirror, with a width of 4 inches, they are the perfect size. The clear transfer tape already sticked to the vinyl and come with an application instruction, making them easy to apply without leaving any residue or bubbles.

【Versatility】In addition to the car's rearview mirror, these self-affirmation stickers can also be applied to any clean, smooth surface, such as a laptop, phone case, or even a bathroom mirror. They are a great way to remind yourself of your worth and maintain a positive attitude no matter where you are.

【Gift Idea】These self-affirmation stickers make the perfect gift for any woman who needs a little reminder to love herself and believe in herself. They are a simple yet powerful way to practice self-love and stay motivated to achieve your goals no matter what challenges you may face.
body.description: About our vinyl stickers Real Vinyl Our stickers are genuinely crafted from vinyl, not UV-printed. Each one is meticulously handmade. Key features include waterproofing, residue-free removal without harming glass or car paint surfaces. Easy to peel off. How to apply our vinyl stickers, So easy!!! 1. Clean surface. 2. Peel backing layer. 3. Apply decal. 4. Pull off transfer tape. 5. Enjoy!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Versatile Use Tumbler, Water Cup, Water Bottle Elevate your hydration game with our vinyl stickers on your tumbler, water cup, or water bottle. Showcase your style while staying refreshed on the go. CellPhone, Laptop Transform your gadgets with our vinyl stickers. Whether it's your cellphone or laptop, add a touch of personality and flair to your tech essentials. Makeup Mirrror, Bathroom Mirror Start your day with positivity by decorating your makeup or bathroom mirror with our vinyl stickers. Infuse your reflection space with a boost of style and motivation.

Details Key features Waterproof Residue-free removal No harming on applied surfaces Easy to peel off Versatile Use How to remove? Our vinyl sticker paper can be easily removed with fingers or fingernails, unlike UV-printed stickers that require a scraper for removal. About our vinyl stickers Real Vinyl Our stickers are genuinely crafted from vinyl, not UV-printed. Each one is meticulously handmade. Key features include waterproofing, residue-free removal without harming glass or car paint surfaces. Easy to peel off. How to apply our vinyl stickers, So easy!!! 1. Clean surface. 2. Peel backing layer. 3. Apply decal. 4. Pull off transfer tape. 5. Enjoy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect daily compliment
reviews.reviewText: I installed this on my wife’s new car and her surprise at first seeing it was beautiful. Brought tears to here eyes! Happy tears. Every time she get in the car she receives a compliment from me when I’m not there to say it in person. Beautiful, well made item and easy to apply. Awesome product and a very meaningful thing to get for someone you adore!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Yes you ARE beautiful!
reviews.reviewText: The 3x Hello Beautiful Rearview Mirror Decals are like daily doses of positivity for your car. These little affirmations are not just stickers; they're a stylish reminder that every glance in the rearview mirror is an opportunity for self-appreciation.The vinyl quality is excellent, adhering seamlessly to the mirror without any fuss. It's a chic accessory for your car, turning your commute into a confidence-boosting experience.Whether you're stuck in traffic or embarking on a road trip, these decals add a touch of charm to your car interior. It's like a personalized message that whispers, "You're fabulous" every time you check your reflection.The set of three decals allows for creative placement, letting you customize your mirror with a variety of self-affirmations. It's a subtle way to inject positivity into your daily routine, turning mundane moments into opportunities for self-love.As car accessories go, these decals are a thoughtful and empowering gift for yourself or the women in your life. It's not just about driving; it's about driving with style and a dash of self-love. Hello Beautiful, indeed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cutest daily affirmation!
reviews.reviewText: Simply beautiful!I have a Tesla Model Y, so our rear view mirrors are on the smaller side but this fit perfectly! I placed it on the top-right so there is zero obstruction to my vision.The quality of the sticker is excellent; it is 3 layers so once applied, the sticker is cut exactly to size too. It comes with 3 stickers total, making this more than worth the cost!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put on, and 4 come inna pack so i have extra

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This sticker is so pretty and easy to assemble. I love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Looks exactly like it does in pic. Love the change in color depending on what angle you’re looking at it from. And it’s always nice to see yourself and say ‘hello gorgeous’. ❤️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love, love, love these little decals. They make the perfect inspirational gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It took about 3 days longer to get to my house than I was told. And I didn’t realize there were 2 per package! That’s OK, I have people I can give them to. But they look really cute. Haven’t put them on anything as they are going to be gifts.
